bug.author: pocheyeniu
bug.summary: Why use tensorflow1.3.0GPU training to get the validation loss is much higher than the CPU training
bug.description: when I use tf1.3.0 CPU vesion, the validation loss is 0.54; but get 0.74 using GPU instead. I can't handle it. Cudnn version is 6.0

comments.comment: I apologize but I am having a hard time understanding what the problem is, where the problem is, and what version it affects. Please resubmit and pay attention to the issue template (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new</denchmark-link> ) . Please provide all the information it asks. We test our code before releases, so this is possibly caused by your specific case. Open a new issue with a reproducible test case if you would like more help. Thank you.
